Implement core functionality for Misuzu Music

Features implemented:
- Complete Clean Architecture with BLoC pattern
- Audio player service with just_audio integration
- Japanese text processing service with kana_kit

- Lyrics repository with Japanese annotation support
- Player BLoC for state management
- Basic UI with Apple Music inspired design
- Music folder selection functionality

Core services:
- AudioPlayerServiceImpl: Full audio playback with queue management
- JapaneseProcessingServiceImpl: Kanji/Katakana to Hiragana conversion
- DatabaseHelper: SQLite operations with FTS
- Music/Lyrics repositories with complete CRUD operations

UI components:
- Main application layout with navigation rail
- Player control bar
- Music library, playlist, search, and settings views
- Responsive design ready for platform-specific adaptations
